author: tmiychao
content:
<@&857649635274915900> Welcome to Devconnect everyone! Hope you all arrived well and are enjoying the sunny Buenos Aires. 

Whether you made it or not, remember, today is the deadline for final report! Please take time to submit your final report today, we would like to read them before your exit interviews. I will merge some pending PRs when I have some free time in here.

For EPF Day presentations tomorrow, please submit them here https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1WuZNjPNbli5HqRHglNQUNxaPpEctILgc?usp=drive_link. You can edit them up until tomorrow morning but make sure they are in the folder. 

EPF day will be also streamed so if you are not in the city, you can participate online!
